verbs.description: [ARG0: sister mary sharon] [V: burns] [ARG1: former chair of theology department at loyola university maryland] dies sister mary sharon burns a member of the sisters of mercy who had chaired the department of theology at loyola university maryland and acted in the college theatrical productions died thursday from complications of a stroke at stella maris hospice she was 91 stella maris hospice in timonium stella maris hospice loyola university maryland loyola sister mary harper sisters of mercy san sebastián mount st agnes college sister m sharon burns mercy high school sister sharon sister m sharon burns sister augusta riley mary sharon burns baltimore
